author: WKRC
title: chevron-right
text: {p}CINCINNATI (WKRC) - Some doctors who usually work with humans came together to help one of the gorillas who broke her arm at the Cincinnati Zoo.{/p}{p}{sd-embed class=\"sd-embedded-media\" data-alt=\"WKRC\" data-caption=\"(WKRC,%20Cincinnati%20Zoo)\" data-duration=\"64.256\" data-externalid=\"3a4dda842ca44c25bbf6fe9eac73443d\" data-mediatype=\"video\" data-renditions=\"\" data-thumburl=\"https://x-default-stgec.uplynk.com/ause/slices/3a4/34d28c6069b34f1d96307c80809697d7/3a4dda842ca44c25bbf6fe9eac73443d/poster_82e3855d93df477d88b401ab65125aa2.png\" data-title=\"Cincinnati%20Zoo%20gets%20help%20from%20Cincinnati%20Children's,%20UC%20Health%20and%20GE%20with%20gorilla%20injury\" data-defaultthumb=\"true\" data-embed-type=\"video\" contenteditable=\"false\"}{/sd-embed}{/p}{p}Gladys was hurt during a scuffle last week with two younger females in her troop.{br}{/p}{p}“It’s not unusual for gorillas to have altercations, and this one was actually a minor squabble,” said Victoria McGee, Cincinnati Zoo’s Zoological Manager of Primates. “She must have fallen in just the wrong way to break her arm, but the result was a complete, oblique fracture of her distal humerus.”{/p}{p}{sd-embed class=\"sd-embedded-media\" data-alt=\"Sajen%20and%20Kotagal.jpg\" data-caption=\"(Cincinnati%20Zoo)\" data-duration=\"\" data-externalid=\"0f77c6fb-fec6-43c1-a423-73dc9d2799de\" data-mediatype=\"image\" data-renditions=\"%7B%22large16x9%22:%7B%22blurSigma%22:-1,%22height%22:450,%22label%22:%22large16x9%22,%22scaleWidth%22:986,%22url%22:%22/resources/media/d4e68c16-8b1d-4587-a79d-1337d3a84f65-large16x9_SajenandKotagal.jpg%22,%22width%22:800,%22x%22:0,%22y%22:208,%22uuid%22:null,%22id%22:%224fbe6b78-b4fd-4c7d-8f3b-76d81f13bdbf%22,%22preciseWidth%22:null,%22preciseHeight%22:null,%22name%22:%22large16x9Url%22,%22rendition%22:%22large16x9%22,%22labelOrConvertedName%22:%22large16x9%22%7D,%22jumbo16x9%22:%7B%22blurSigma%22:-1,%22height%22:450,%22label%22:%22jumbo16x9%22,%22scaleWidth%22:1320,%22url%22:%22/resources/media/d4e68c16-8b1d-4587-a79d-1337d3a84f65-jumbo16x9_SajenandKotagal.jpg%22,%22width%22:800,%22x%22:0,%22y%22:208,%22uuid%22:null,%22id%22:%22ed503872-5431-4a73-9655-64faeca5b33e%22,%22preciseWidth%22:null,%22preciseHeight%22:null,%22name%22:%22jumbo16x9Url%22,%22rendition%22:%22jumbo16x9%22,%22labelOrConvertedName%22:%22jumbo16x9%22%7D,%22small16x9%22:%7B%22blurSigma%22:-1,%22height%22:450,%22label%22:%22small16x9%22,%22scaleWidth%22:160,%22url%22:%22/resources/media/d4e68c16-8b1d-4587-a79d-1337d3a84f65-small16x9_SajenandKotagal.jpg%22,%22width%22:800,%22x%22:0,%22y%22:208,%22uuid%22:null,%22id%22:%22cdf6364a-3748-4dc4-abeb-0f17e0a447a5%22,%22preciseWidth%22:null,%22preciseHeight%22:null,%22name%22:%22small16x9Url%22,%22rendition%22:%22small16x9%22,%22labelOrConvertedName%22:%22small16x9%22%7D,%22full16x9%22:%7B%22blurSigma%22:-1,%22height%22:450,%22label%22:%22full16x9%22,%22scaleWidth%22:800,%22url%22:%22/resources/media/d4e68c16-8b1d-4587-a79d-1337d3a84f65-full16x9_SajenandKotagal.jpg%22,%22width%22:800,%22x%22:0,%22y%22:208,%22uuid%22:null,%22id%22:%220ea7cfcb-58f1-4961-8854-5b7364933237%22,%22preciseWidth%22:null,%22preciseHeight%22:null,%22name%22:%22full16x9Url%22,%22rendition%22:%22full16x9%22,%22labelOrConvertedName%22:%22full16x9%22%7D,%22medium16x9%22:%7B%22blurSigma%22:-1,%22height%22:450,%22label%22:%22medium16x9%22,%22scaleWidth%22:648,%22url%22:%22/resources/media/d4e68c16-8b1d-4587-a79d-1337d3a84f65-medium16x9_SajenandKotagal.jpg%22,%22width%22:800,%22x%22:0,%22y%22:208,%22uuid%22:null,%22id%22:%22b6f921c8-f24c-4de8-a30a-0ccb0db511a0%22,%22preciseWidth%22:null,%22preciseHeight%22:null,%22name%22:%22medium16x9Url%22,%22rendition%22:%22medium16x9%22,%22labelOrConvertedName%22:%22medium16x9%22%7D%7D\" data-thumburl=\"/resources/media/d4e68c16-8b1d-4587-a79d-1337d3a84f65-medium16x9_SajenandKotagal.jpg\" data-title=\"Cincinnati%20Zoo%20gets%20help%20from%20Cincinnati%20Children's,%20UC%20Health%20and%20GE%20to%20help%20gorilla\" data-url=\"\" data-defaultthumb=\"true\" data-embed-file=\"%0A%20%20%20%20%3Cdiv%20class=%22sda-ImageEmbed%22%3E%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%3Cimg%20src=%22/resources/media/d4e68c16-8b1d-4587-a79d-1337d3a84f65-medium16x9_SajenandKotagal.jpg%22%20alt=%22%22%20/%3E%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%3Cdiv%20class=%22sda-ImageEmbed-caption%22%3E(Cincinnati%20Zoo)%3C/div%3E%0A%20%20%20%20%3C/div%3E\" data-embed-type=\"image\" contenteditable=\"false\"}{/sd-embed}{/p}{p}The break Gladys suffered is not a common injury at the zoo so it brought in surgeons from Cincinnati Children's Hospital and anesthesiologists from the University of Cincinnati College of Medicine.{br}{/p}{p}{sd-embed class=\"sd-embedded-media\" data-alt=\"xray%20before%202.jpg\" data-caption=\"(Cincinnati%20Zoo)\" data-duration=\"\" data-externalid=\"97c31044-4dde-4ac7-a548-86023e6262eb\" data-mediatype=\"image\" data-renditions=\"%7B%22large16x9%22:%7B%22blurSigma%22:-1,%22height%22:1701,%22label%22:%22large16x9%22,%22scaleWidth%22:986,%22url%22:%22/resources/media/97c31044-4dde-4ac7-a548-86023e6262eb-large16x9_xraybefore2.jpg%22,%22width%22:3024,%22x%22:0,%22y%22:1166,%22uuid%22:null,%22id%22:%22497bd1c1-8ae8-4d13-9074-be8bc4628370%22,%22preciseWidth%22:null,%22preciseHeight%22:null,%22name%22:%22large16x9Url%22,%22rendition%22:%22large16x9%22,%22labelOrConvertedName%22:%22large16x9%22%7D,%22jumbo16x9%22:%7B%22blurSigma%22:-1,%22height%22:1701,%22label%22:%22jumbo16x9%22,%22scaleWidth%22:1320,%22url%22:%22/resources/media/97c31044-4dde-4ac7-a548-86023e6262eb-jumbo16x9_xraybefore2.jpg%22,%22width%22:3024,%22x%22:0,%22y%22:1166,%22uuid%22:null,%22id%22:%228fe34352-b0ee-45d4-9678-9dfab1d598c4%22,%22preciseWidth%22:null,%22preciseHeight%22:null,%22name%22:%22jumbo16x9Url%22,%22rendition%22:%22jumbo16x9%22,%22labelOrConvertedName%22:%22jumbo16x9%22%7D,%22small16x9%22:%7B%22blurSigma%22:-1,%22height%22:1701,%22label%22:%22small16x9%22,%22scaleWidth%22:160,%22url%22:%22/resources/media/97c31044-4dde-4ac7-a548-86023e6262eb-small16x9_xraybefore2.jpg%22,%22width%22:3024,%22x%22:0,%22y%22:1166,%22uuid%22:null,%22id%22:%22aa13089f-64bd-4944-9102-554b8a1974eb%22,%22preciseWidth%22:null,%22preciseHeight%22:null,%22name%22:%22small16x9Url%22,%22rendition%22:%22small16x9%22,%22labelOrConvertedName%22:%22small16x9%22%7D,%22full16x9%22:%7B%22blurSigma%22:-1,%22height%22:1701,%22label%22:%22full16x9%22,%22scaleWidth%22:3024,%22url%22:%22/resources/media/97c31044-4dde-4ac7-a548-86023e6262eb-full16x9_xraybefore2.jpg%22,%22width%22:3024,%22x%22:0,%22y%22:1166,%22uuid%22:null,%22id%22:%22542c0797-a1a4-4dfe-aa7b-206dd573ff45%22,%22preciseWidth%22:null,%22preciseHeight%22:null,%22name%22:%22full16x9Url%22,%22rendition%22:%22full16x9%22,%22labelOrConvertedName%22:%22full16x9%22%7D,%22medium16x9%22:%7B%22blurSigma%22:-1,%22height%22:1701,%22label%22:%22medium16x9%22,%22scaleWidth%22:648,%22url%22:%22/resources/media/97c31044-4dde-4ac7-a548-86023e6262eb-medium16x9_xraybefore2.jpg%22,%22width%22:3024,%22x%22:0,%22y%22:1166,%22uuid%22:null,%22id%22:%22d8d6c64d-a85b-4b64-9d48-20c8cc99c0d3%22,%22preciseWidth%22:null,%22preciseHeight%22:null,%22name%22:%22medium16x9Url%22,%22rendition%22:%22medium16x9%22,%22labelOrConvertedName%22:%22medium16x9%22%7D%7D\" data-thumburl=\"/resources/media/97c31044-4dde-4ac7-a548-86023e6262eb-medium16x9_xraybefore2.jpg\" data-title=\"Cincinnati%20Zoo%20gets%20help%20from%20Cincinnati%20Children's,%20UC%20Health%20and%20GE%20to%20help%20gorilla\" data-url=\"\" data-defaultthumb=\"true\" data-embed-file=\"%0A%20%20%20%20%3Cdiv%20class=%22sda-ImageEmbed%22%3E%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%3Cimg%20src=%22/resources/media/97c31044-4dde-4ac7-a548-86023e6262eb-medium16x9_xraybefore2.jpg%22%20alt=%22%22%20/%3E%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%20%3Cdiv%20class=%22sda-ImageEmbed-caption%22%3E(Cincinnati%20Zoo)%3C/div%3E%0A%20%20%20%20%3C/div%3E\" data-embed-type=\"image\" contenteditable=\"false\"}{/sd-embed}{/p}{p}After surgery, a temporary cast was put on Gladys.{br}{/p}{p}GE Additive is working to create a custom 3D-printed cast made of titanium which should be ready Friday.{/p}{p}“Gladys is naturally curious about her new cast, and she doesn’t fully understand the need to preserve it for her recovery,” explained Dr. Mike Wenninger, Cincinnati Zoo’s Director of Animal Health. “So, we turned to our friends at GE [Additive] to help us create a sturdier cast.”{/p}{p}“Gorillas hang from their arms, which is very different from a lot of the pediatric patients we care for. It’s also difficult to help Gladys understand what we have done surgically and why we need to protect the repair,” said Dr. Jaime Denning, Orthopedic Surgeon Liaison for Trauma at Cincinnati Children’s. “That’s why we needed to use heavier-duty equipment and a stronger cast. We look forward to seeing Gladys get back to hanging once she heals.”{/p}{p}Gladys will be behind the scenes for at least six more weeks. Her care team is monitoring her closely and providing around-the-clock observation and treatments to make sure that she is getting what she needs. They are also distracting her as needed to prevent the temporary cast from being destroyed.

organizations.name: university of cincinnati college of medicine
